title: Kevin Riford Reports Niagara County Bail Bond Fraud to NYS Department of Financial Services - E-mail Communications

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Kevin Riford Reports Niagara County Bail Bond Fraud to NYS Department of Financial Services - E-mail Communications
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

1.) Any and all emails received by william.fedrau@dfs.ny.gov, laura.sankey@dfs.ny.gov, warren.lester@dfs.ny.gov from kevinriford1@protonmail.com for the following time period 01/01/2023 - 01/08/2025
2.) Any and all emails sent from william.fedrau@dfs.ny.gov, laura.sankey@dfs.ny.gov, warren.lester@dfs.ny.gov to kevinriford1@protonmail to  for the following time period 01/01/2023 - 01/08/2025

I have attached copies of the referenced email communications for clarity. Thank you.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Riford Family

title: DeSantis records re: Libs of TikTok Drivers License story

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: DeSantis records re: Libs of TikTok Drivers License story
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All electronic communications, including cell phone text messages, sent or received by the following officials between Dec. 20, 2024 and Jan. 8, 2025 containing the key terms "license" or "tiktok":

- Chief of Staff James Uthmeier
- Director of Communications Bryan Griffin
- Press Secretary Jeremy Redfern
- General Counsel Ryan Newman

For the purposes of this request, please include the full email chains these terms are found in.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

CJ Ciaramella
